overview: Beau Vrolyk is currently an Angel Investor and Board Member of several technology startups. He has been building technology products and founding companies in Silicon Valley for over 30 years. During this time he has served as a Senior Executive and Board Member of numerous companies including Arete, Zilog, Silicon Graphics, Xerox, OpCode, TogetherSoft, Cassatt, and RMI. Most recently he was a Managing Director at Warburg Pincus, a Global Private Equity Company, where he led the Global Systems and Semiconductor practice.

funding_round.source_description: Q&A: David Stern on Clearstone's backing Apture
